H0.text: In which country is the city of Kandahar. Pakistan

H1.text: In which country is the city of Kandahar. India

H2.text: In which country is the city of Kandahar. Iran

H3.text: In which country is the city of Kandahar. IROA

A4.text: Kandahar is a city in Afghanistan

A5.text: The Shrine of the Cloak in Kandahar, a city founded by Alexander the Great and the first capital of Afghanistan.

A6.text: The other large cities are located generally in the 'ring' around the Central Highlands, namely Kandahar in the south, Herat in the west, Mazar-i-Sharif, Kunduz in the north, and Jalalabad in the east.

A7.text: The provincial capital is the city of Kandahar, which functions as the main administrative, economic, and cultural center of southern Afghanistan.

A8.text: The only cities in Afghanistan with over 1 million people are the country's capital, Kabul, and the city of Kandahar.
